items.title: Pro-Palestinian protesters at Italy's soccer training center to oppose game against Israel
items.summary: The protest was part of a national strike by more than two million people, ahead of the Israel-Italy World Cup qualifier set to be played in Udine later this month

items.title: Report: Netanyahu ordered drone strikes on Gaza-bound aid ships in early September
items.summary: CBS News reports that Netanyahu ordered two drone strikes to be carried out against two ships, one carrying the Portuguese flag and the other the British flag ■ On Friday, the Israeli army completed the takeover of all vessels in the Global Sumud Flotilla

items.title: World leaders urge Hamas and Israel to follow through on Trump's Gaza peace plan to release hostages, end war
items.summary: Trump, along with Arab nations, Europe and Israeli opposition leaders are calling on both sides to begin immediate negotiations to release the hostages and end the war, after Hamas said it accepts, in principle, the framework of Trump's plan to end the war
